partnerDetails.about:
Actemium Berlin is specialized in automation and control solutions across the process industry. Our focus is an integrated engineering process from the CAE System to database supported information processing and  structured object-oriented software engineering for PLC and SCADA. 

We develop solutions designed to enhance and optimize our customers’ facilities and processes in the fields of automation and process control

technology, electrical engineering, measurement, instrumentation and control systems through to power supply.

Actemium is a manufacturer-independent systems integrator.

Our teams cover the entire life cycle of facilities and systems, from engineering and implementation to maintenance and servicing.

Under the heading of Smart Industry Solutions, we group together services, concepts and methods that will assist you in meeting future requirements in the area of automation technology.

We develop solutions designed to enhance and optimize our customers’ facilities and processes in the fields of automation and process control

technology, electrical engineering, measurement, instrumentation and control systems through to power supply.

Actemium is a manufacturer-independent systems integrator.

Our teams cover the entire life cycle of facilities and systems, from engineering and implementation to maintenance and servicing.

Under the heading of Smart Industry Solutions, we group together services, concepts and methods that will assist you in meeting future requirements in the area of automation technology.
